Alright I got it to work with NO patch and NO cracked file

I used DAEMON Tools Pro anf created an IDE Drive (as opposed to a SCSI drives which is the normal stock drive made by Daemon Tools)
To do that just click on Tools - Add IDE Virtual Drive
- Mount the image file
- Turn on SafeDisc, SecuRom, LaserLok and RMPS (all in the program already, shown as red or green switches under the drives)
- Play and enjoy

I got it....
1. Use MagicISO or PowerISO to convert the .MDF file to .ISO format.
2. Use Daemon Tools to mount it.
3. Install (Cd KEY is Z79H-AJJ3-DKJA-AVDZ-6974)
4. Download crack from http://thepiratebay.se/details.php?id=3407973
5. Replace original .exe file with crack.
6. Run the game, it works.

If anyone could not detect the file using Daemon Tools try to change the setting of the one showing the files into All files (*.*) (at the bottom right of the window)

Hope it works.
